message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway between my initial offer and your counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I can see you're getting close to your target, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll sell the product to you for $10500.
I understand your need to make a profit, but I'm getting close to my target budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
